attributes.action: Ensure Politicians Deploy on Operations for 6-7 Months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If politicians had a military background or deployed on Operations they would then be qualified to answer questions about the armed forces, not the odd 2 hrs visit to Afghanistan as a fact finding mission at which all they get is the,"Oh we are doing fine here in the rear area camp!"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
